document.full_text: hedge fund founder raj rajaratnam, absent for three days from his trial on insider trading charges because of a foot infection, returned to the new york courthouse on friday wearing a blue vinyl medical shoe.
document.title: rajaratnam returns to his trial, nursing right foot
lines_and_colors: hedge fund founder raj rajaratnam, absent for three days from his trial on insider trading charges because of a foot infection, returned to the new york courthouse on friday wearing a blue vinyl medical shoe.
